Template.TextPart:
{{#if catering}}

Hello {{catering.name}}

You have indicated that you are interested in receiving catering information. We will reach you shortly on your mobile number {{catering.phoneNumber}}

{{else}}

Hello {{order.name}}

Your order is placed successfully. Transaction id: {{order.transactionId}}. Total amount: {{order.amount}}

{{/if}}

You have indicated that you are interested in receiving catering information. We will reach you shortly on your mobile number {{catering.phoneNumber}}
